metadata.title: CVE-2017-8810 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - low
metadata.description: MediaWiki before 1.27.4, 1.28.x before 1.28.3, and 1.29.x before 1.29.2,when a private wiki is configured, provides different error messages forfailed login attempts depending on whether the username exists, whichallows remote attackers to enumerate account names and conduct brute-forceattacks via a series of requests.

criterions.comment: mediawiki: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
